about_the_game:
The following content is included:

●Felyne Layered Armor: Felyne Ashigaru Hat
●Felyne Layered Armor: Felyne Ashigaru Plate

Cute foot soldier-style layered armor for your palico. This just might make your palico look more dependable than usual!
Enjoy the hunting life with your trusty companion equipped with special layered armor!

*This item changes the appearance of your palico. It does not effect stats or abilities.
*This content can be used from the "Appearance Menu" in the tent.

*This product is also available as part of a set. Please be careful of duplicate transactions.
*You may need to update to the latest version of the game to use this content.
